amendment.description: To clarify the FCC's authority to require 9-1-1 service, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4086 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4086 proposed by Senator Nelson FL for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S1206; text: CR S1206) To clarify the FCC's authority to require 9-1-1 service, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4086 proposed by Senator Nelson FL for Senator Inouye.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4086 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
